hibernate-mapping.query: from FileDownloadInfo as fileDownloadInfo where fileDownloadInfo.ipAddress = ? AND fileDownloadInfo.irFileId = ? AND fileDownloadInfo.downloadDate = ?

select sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo where fileDownloadInfo.irFileId = ? and (select count(*) from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart1 = ignore.fromAddress1 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart2 = ignore.fromAddress2 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart3 = ignore.fromAddress3 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart4 between ignore.fromAddress4 and ignore.toAddress4) = 0

select sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo where (select count(*) from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart1 = ignore.fromAddress1 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart2 = ignore.fromAddress2 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart3 = ignore.fromAddress3 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart4 between ignore.fromAddress4 and ignore.toAddress4) = 0

select sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) from FileDownloadInfo as fileDownloadInfo, InstitutionalCollection as institutionalCollection join institutionalCollection.items institutionalItem join institutionalItem.versionedInstitutionalItem versionedInstitutionalItem join versionedInstitutionalItem.institutionalItemVersions institutionalItemVersion join institutionalItemVersion.item item join item.itemFiles itemFile where institutionalCollection.id = ? and itemFile.irFile.id = fileDownloadInfo.irFileId and (select count(*) from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart1 = ignore.fromAddress1 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart2 = ignore.fromAddress2 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart3 = ignore.fromAddress3 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart4 between ignore.fromAddress4 and ignore.toAddress4) = 0

select sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) from FileDownloadInfo as fileDownloadInfo, InstitutionalCollection as institutionalCollection join institutionalCollection.items institutionalItem join institutionalItem.versionedInstitutionalItem versionedInstitutionalItem join versionedInstitutionalItem.institutionalItemVersions institutionalItemVersion join institutionalItemVersion.item item join item.itemFiles itemFile where itemFile.irFile.id = fileDownloadInfo.irFileId and institutionalCollection.leftValue >= ? and institutionalCollection.leftValue <= ? and institutionalCollection.treeRoot.id = ? and (select count(*) from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart1 = ignore.fromAddress1 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart2 = ignore.fromAddress2 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart3 = ignore.fromAddress3 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart4 between ignore.fromAddress4 and ignore.toAddress4) = 0

select sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) from FileDownloadInfo as fileDownloadInfo, GenericItem as item join item.itemFiles itemFile where item.id = ? and itemFile.irFile.id = fileDownloadInfo.irFileId and (select count(*) from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart1 = ignore.fromAddress1 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart2 = ignore.fromAddress2 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart3 = ignore.fromAddress3 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart4 between ignore.fromAddress4 and ignore.toAddress4) = 0

select sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) as downloadCount, max(institutionalItemVersion.dateOfDeposit) as latestDatePublished, institutionalItem from FileDownloadInfo as fileDownloadInfo, InstitutionalItem as institutionalItem join institutionalItem.versionedInstitutionalItem as versionedInstitutionalItem join versionedInstitutionalItem.institutionalItemVersions as institutionalItemVersion join institutionalItemVersion.item as item join item.contributors as itemContributor join itemContributor.contributor as contributor join item.itemFiles itemFile where itemFile.irFile.id = fileDownloadInfo.irFileId and contributor.personName.id in (:personNameIds) and (select count(*) from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart1 = ignore.fromAddress1 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart2 = ignore.fromAddress2 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart3 = ignore.fromAddress3 and fileDownloadInfo.ipAddressPart4 between ignore.fromAddress4 and ignore.toAddress4) = 0 group by institutionalItem order by sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) desc, max(institutionalItemVersion.dateOfDeposit) desc
